measure.name: Swap Schedule for Plug Loads
measure.description: Reduce the run time of plug loads by using advanced power strips to turn them off when not in use.
measure.modeler_description: Finds all instances of a given electric equipment definition in either the whole building or a given space type and replaces their existing fractional schedule with another schedule from the model. This can be used to represent advanced power strips, dedicated scheduled plug load circuits, etc.
